Text:
That performance by Princess Alexia and Rose the
other day was incredible! I thought it would be
some boring ceremony, but they really livened it up!

Yeah, what an awesome idea! *sigh* I wish they'd do
it again...

(The whole Academy is buzzing about our performance.
Who would've thought it'd be such a hit.)

Oh, Princess Alexia! Please put on another
performance!
I'm like, your biggest fan now! I believe in you!
Thanks. Well, if the opportunity arises...

(...That said, Pooch doesn't seem to be thinking
about another one.)

(Anyway, singing and dancing was fun, I guess. If he
really wants to, I wouldn't mind considering it—)
Wait, huh...?

(Pooch? What's with that serious look on his
face...? Kinda unusual for him.)
Man, I totally missed out... Those two could've...

("Those two"...? He's talking about me and Rose,
right? If he's saying he missed out...)

...I mean, even just Alexia... If only I had another
chance...!
Then, my life would be complete...

(Just as I thought! As our producer...no, as my
producer, Pooch wants to see me perform again!)
*sigh* But it's probably too late now.

(Just look at him sigh like that... He really is too
late. But...I've also been waiting.)

(Jeez, Pooch really is hopeless! I'll take the
initiative this time. He better be grateful!)
...What a complete failure.

(Why didn't I take advantage of the situation and
come up with a profit-making system...?)

(Well, not that I could've told them outright that
their fresh smiles could earn me a fortune...)

(Still, I could've set up things like exclusive
handshake events or autograph sessions.)

(Ohh...if only I'd been more observant...my life
would've been set with the funds I raised...!)
(Oh well. I guess it's too late now...)
*sigh*
How long are you gonna keep sighing like that?
Huh...?

Isn't this what you wanted? Come on, enjoy it to
your heart's content!

...What's gotten into you all of a sudden?
And what's with your outfit?

Your life will be complete with the memory of me in
this, right? That's why I decided to wear it for you
again.

I mean...you should've just asked sooner. I would've
worn it for you whenever you wanted.
Hey, come on! What's with the silence?!

Quit trying to hide how happy it makes you. You
wanted to see me in my stage outfit, didn't you?
I wanted to see you in it...when?

Now! Just now! You were sighing and mumbling about
how you wanted to see me in my stage outfit again.
I didn't say that.
Huh?
Like I said, I didn't say that.
Huh?! But you definitely said, "Alexia"!

(Wait, was I accidentally thinking out loud, and did
Alexia overhear it?)

(Ugh, what an annoying turn of events... I need to
somehow dissuade her...)
...I was thinking about Tuna King.
...Excuse me?

I thought we'd have an after-party there, but Rose
seemed busy, so I wanted to at least invite you.
I thought I might regret it otherwise.

Wha...what the heck?! So, it was all just my
misunderstanding...?!

That's right. Well, you seem busy anyway, so maybe
next time—

Aaaaargh!!! In that case, you should've said so
sooner!

As punishment, you'll obey everything I tell you
today! Understood?!
Th-That's so unfair...!

Shut it! You can start by treating me to Tuna King!
Now hurry up and take me there!

After that, Alexia's mood improves slightly by
making Cid fulfill her every whim...
